comments.body: I think initializing_from_value isn't documented in get_variable. So perhaps clarify that here?

yep, `initializing_from_value` isn't documented in `get_variable`. While, `get_variable` calls `_get_single_variable` and `_get_partitioned_variable`, and both them define it.
